sentences.english: Chitosan coating significantly inhibited respiration of kuerle fragrant pear.

sentences.english: Korla City has a long history of the ancient Silk Road routes throat.

sentences.english: I am Xinjiang Korla Tianshan food products factory factory manager, private enterprise.
